Starting Your Adventure
開始你的旅程
Receive your first starter and your crucial starting items from Professor Tamarind.
從塔瑪琳博士那裡獲得第一個精靈和其他重要物品。
Find the First Gym Leader
尋找第一個道館館主
Search the island for Lambert, the first Makya League Gym Leader. He can be found somewhere in Bluepoint Beach, west of Casaba Villa.
在島上尋找館主蘭伯特，它或許在甜瓜度假區西邊藍瑩海灘的某個地方。
Find Dynamite
尋找炸藥
Find a Dynamite Stick to destroy the rock which blocks the way to Bluepoint Beach. You can find one in the Foreclosed Tunnel to the north of Casaba Villa.
找到炸藥，破壞阻擋前往藍瑩海灘的石頭，或許在甜瓜度假區北邊的隧道中找到。
Explore Bluepoint Beach
探索藍瑩海灘
Now that you've blown up the rock in front of Bluepoint Beach, you should search there for Lambert, the gym leader of Casaba Villa.
炸燬通往藍瑩海灘的岩石後，前去尋找甜瓜道館館主蘭伯特。
Defeat the Avatar!
打敗化身
You found Lambert in a small Grotto on the far west end of Bluepoint Beach, defeated by an Avatar of Vigoroth. Defeat the Avatar and free up Lambert.
你在藍瑩海灘的一個石窟中發現了蘭伯特，他被一個化身打敗了，打敗那個化身。
Defeat Your First Gym
挑戰第一個道館
Defeat Lambert, the first Makya League Gym Leader, inside his gym in Casaba Villa.
在甜瓜度假區的道館裡找到蘭伯特並擊敗他，完成第一個道館挑戰。
Meet Tamarind at the Docks
在碼頭跟塔瑪琳見面
Tamarind is waiting for you at the Casaba Villa dock, where your boat is.
塔瑪琳說要在碼頭上見一面，你的船就停在那裡。
Embark to the Mainland
乘船前往大陸
Now that you've earned your first badge, you're ready to take your boat to the Makyan mainland.
現在已經獲得第一個徽章了，可以乘船前往馬凱亞大陸了。
Find the Second Gym
尋找第二個道館
Find the second gym leader, located in Novo Town (north of the Shipping Lane).
找到第二個道館館主，他就在揚帆路北邊的望新鎮。
Defeat the Mysterious Woman
打敗神祕女子
A mysterious young women blocks your exit from the Shipping Lane. Defeat her to gain access to Novo Town.
一名神祕的女子堵住了揚帆路的出口，打敗她就能進入望新鎮。
Defeat Novo Town Gym
打敗望新道館
Defeat Eko, leader of Novo Town gym. Novo Town is north of the Shipping Lane. Eko's gym is in the northeast part of town.
擊敗望新鎮東北部的道館館主，這裡的館主是艾克。
Find LuxTech Campus
前往光華市
Find the third gym leader, located at LuxTech Campus. LuxTech Campus is west of the Lingering Delta and East of the County Park.
找到位於光華市的第三位道館館主。光華市位於漫步河原的西邊和國立公園的東邊。
Schedule Your Gym Appointment
預約道館挑戰
A large sign at the entrance of the LuxTech Campus Gym told you to schedule your gym appointment inside LuxTech main, the large central building of LuxTech campus, to the west of the gym.
光華市道館門口的一塊牌子上寫著 ，請到西側的光華大廈預約挑戰時間。
Find Helena's Package
尋找海倫娜的包裹
Helena will challenge you as a gym leader if you find the LuxTech Shipment, a key package which was last seen in Gigalith's Guts, a cave tunnel inside Mt. Kilna.
你必須要找到最後一次出現在怪巖腸道的光華包裹，館主海倫娜才會同意你的挑戰。
The mysterious woman from the Shipping Lane blocks your path again, demanding a battle before allowing you further. Defeat her to gain access to the rest of the Hollowed Layer.
那個揚帆路的神祕女子又一次擋住了去路，她要求你必須要跟她再來一場戰鬥，才能繼續前進。
Defeat the Avatars
擊敗化身
Alongside the mysterious woman, defeat Avatars in the Hollowed Layer which stand in the way of finding the LuxTech Package for Helena.
與這位神祕的女子一起，打敗附近的化身，並找到海倫娜丟失的包裹。
Collect Helena's Package
拿到海倫娜的包裹
Now that the avatar of Linoone has been defeated, you can collect the LuxTech Shipment which it stole.
周圍的化身已經都被擊敗了，現在可以拿到光華的貨物了。
Return LuxTech Package
帶著包裹回到光華市
You've found a shipment bound for LuxTech. Go to LuxTech and find whoever the intended recipient was, so that you may return it to them.
你拿到海倫娜丟失的包裹了，現在返回光華市將其交給她吧。
Return Helena's Package
將包裹交給海倫娜
You've found and collected Helena's missing shipment. Return to LuxTech and hand her the package so that she will challenge you as a Gym Leader.
你拿到海倫娜丟失的包裹了，現在她會接受你的道館挑戰了。
Defeat LuxTech Campus Gym
挑戰光華道館
Defeat Helena, leader of LuxTech Campus Gym. LuxTech is west of the Lingering Delta and east of the County Park. Her Gym can be found east of the large central building.
擊敗光華道館的館主海倫娜吧，可以在光華市大型建築東邊找到她的道館。
Find Velenz Gym
尋找夜幽道館
Find the fourth gym leader, located in Velenz. Velenz is west of Repora Forest, which can be found by passing through either Svait or the Shelf.
找到位於夜幽市的第四個道館，夜幽市位於枯槁森林以西，可以通過霜皚鎮或潺流坡前往那裡。
Find Rafael, the Gym Leader
尋找館主拉斐爾
You've arrived in Velenz only to discover that Rafael is in hiding. Search for Rafael in the ruins of the haunted town.
你發現夜幽道館的館主拉斐爾藏起來了，在這個廢棄的城市中尋找他吧。
Find 4 Digit Slips
尋找4個密碼紙條
You found Rafael in the south east of Velenz, down a ladder. To unlock the door to his room, you must find at least four Digit Slips somewhere around Velenz. Velenz is west of Repora Forest.
要打開拉斐爾的門，必須在夜幽市找到至少四張密碼紙條。
Defeat Velenz Gym
挑戰夜幽道館
Defeat Rafael, leader of Velenz Gym. Velenz is west of Repora Forest. He can be found down a ladder in the north-west part of the town.
擊敗夜幽道館的館主拉斐爾吧，拿到第四個徽章。
Defend Grouz from the Avatar!
擊敗古治鎮的化身！
Professor Tamarind called, informing you of an Avatar of Steelix which is rampaging in the Grouz Mine Yard. She's promised a reward if you can defeat the Avatar.
塔瑪琳博士打來電話，告訴你有個大鋼蛇化身正在古治礦場肆虐，只要去處理掉它，就能得到一筆獎勵。
Visit Tamarind at Helena's House
去海倫娜家見塔瑪琳
Go to the County Park and find Helena's House, where Professor Tamarind is waiting for you with a reward. Helena's house can be found North West of the lake, very close to it.
前往國立公園，找到海倫娜的房子，塔瑪琳博士正帶著獎勵等在那兒，就在湖的西北方。
Defeat Yezera in Helena's House
擊敗海倫娜家裡的葉澤拉
Professor Tamarind invited you to Helena's House in the County Park, but you found only Yezera there. Fight Yezera to kill some time before Professor Tamarind arrives.
塔瑪琳教授邀請你去海倫娜家，但那裡只見到了葉澤拉，在博士趕來前，先來一場戰鬥吧。
Find Prizca West Gym
尋找西宏禮道館
Find the fifth gym leader, located in Prizca West. Prizca West is north of the Eleig River Crossing.
找到西宏禮市的道館館主，位於埃利格河渡口以北。
Defeat Prizca West Gym
挑戰西宏禮道館
Defeat Bence and Zoé, leaders of Prizca West gym. Prizca West is north of the Eleig River Crossing. Their Gym is found in the southern of the two central blocks.
打敗西宏禮道館的本斯或佐伊，當然也可以同時挑戰他們兩個。
Find Prizca East Gym
尋找東宏禮道館
Find the sixth gym leader, located in Prizca East. Prizca East is east of the Battle Plaza, which is east of Prizca West.
找到東宏禮市的道館館主，從西宏禮市往東走，穿過對戰區就能到達。
Defeat Prizca East Gym
挑戰東宏禮道館
Defeat Noel, leader of Prizca East gym. Prizca East is east of the Battle Plaza, which is east of Prizca West. His gym is in the center of town, east of the large Makya Capitol Building.
打敗東宏禮道館館主諾埃爾，只要從西宏禮市往東走，穿過對戰區就能到達。
Find the Catacombs
尋找地下墓穴
Professor Tamarind called you, requesting your urgent help dealing with a problem in the Prizca Catacombs. The Catacombs can be found in the eastern part of the Prizca Sewers.
塔瑪琳博士打電話給你，請求你幫忙處理宏禮市地下墓穴的一個緊急問題，地下墓穴位於東宏禮市的下水道中。
Investigate the Catacombs
調查地下墓穴
Go with Professor Tamarind to confront the thieves inside of the Catacombs. The Catacombs can be found in the eastern part of the Prizca Sewers.
與塔瑪琳博士一起去迎戰地下墓穴中的盜賊，地下墓穴位於東宏禮市的下水道中。
Defeat Yezera in the Catacombs
在地下墓穴擊敗葉澤拉
Confront Yezera, who appears to be leading a small group to steal Regidrago. The Catacombs can be found in the eastern part of the Prizca Sewers.
擊敗葉澤拉，她似乎正率領一隊人，打算偷走雷吉鐸拉戈。
Defeat the Catacombs Straggler
在地下墓穴擊敗徘徊者
Go further into the Catacombs to confront the fourth member of Yezera's group, who stayed behind while the others fled with Regidrago.
繼續深入地下墓穴，與葉澤拉的一位同謀對戰，他在其他人離開時留在了後面。
Find Sweetrock Harbor Gym
尋找蜜巖道館
Find the seventh gym leader, located in Sweetrock Harbor. Sweetrock Harbor is east of the Split Peaks, which you can cross with your new Climbing Gear.
找到位於蜜巖港的第七位道館館主，但路被某個支持葉澤拉的蒙面人堵住了。
Defeat the Crimson Cultist
擊敗深紅崇拜者
The path to the seventh gym is blocked by a disguised supporter of Yezera, with a Crimson eye mask. Defeat this villain to rescue Regirock, and gain access to the seventh gym.
通往第七個道館的路被一個戴著深紅色面罩的葉澤拉支持者擋住了，打敗他就能前往第七個道館。
Defeat Sweetrock Harbor Gym
挑戰蜜巖道館
Defeat Victoire, leader of Sweetrock Harbor Gym. Sweetrock Harbor is east of the Split Peaks. Her gym is in the north part of the town, on the raised earthen platform.
打敗蜜巖道館館主薇克特爾，蜜巖港位於嵌口峰以東，她的道館就在港口的最北邊。
Find Team Chasm HQ Gym
尋找裂隙隊總部道館
Find the eight gym leader, located in Team Chasm HQ. Team Chasm HQ can be found underneath Gigalith's Guts.
找到位於裂隙隊總部的第八個道館館主，可以在怪巖腸道通過梯子前往。
Defeat Team Chasm HQ Gym
擊敗裂隙隊總部道館
Defeat Samorne, leader of Team Chasm HQ Gym. Team Chasm HQ can be found underneath Gigalith's Guts. Her gym is on the southwest part of the HQ, inside a sunken area.
擊敗裂隙隊總部道館館主賽蒙，可以通過怪巖腸道的梯子前往那裡，她的道館就在那邊的下沉區域。
Investigate Whitebloom Town
調查白花鎮
Yezera's been spotted in Whitebloom Town with some of the stolen titans. Find her, and rescue them. From Highland Lake, travel through the Cave of Hatching towards Whitebloom.
有人發現葉澤拉和那些蒙面人出現在白花鎮了，可以通過雲上湖，再穿過啟明之窟前往那裡。
Defeat the Teal Cultist
擊敗茶色崇拜者
The path into Whitebloom Town is blocked by a disguised supporter of Yezera, with a Teal eye mask. Defeat this villain to rescue Regice, and gain access to Whitebloom Town.
進入白花鎮的路被一個戴著茶色面罩的葉澤拉支持者堵住了，打敗他就能進入白花鎮。
What was the Teal-Eye-Mask villain doing in the Cave of Hatching? Investigate Whitebloom Town, hometown of the first Makyan champion, Yezera.
他們到底想要幹什麼？調查白花鎮，這裡是馬凱亞第一位冠軍葉澤拉的故鄉。
Defeat Yezera in Whitebloom Town
在白花鎮擊敗葉澤拉
Yezera has returned to Whitebloom Town, her home town. Confront Yezera at the southern cliff, overlooking the Highland Lake.
葉澤拉回到了家鄉白花鎮，就在南邊的懸崖上俯瞰著雲上湖。
Find the Championship Tournament
尋找競技大會舉辦地
Find the Tournament Grounds, site of the Makyan Championship. The Grounds can be found north of the Battle Plaza in the center of Prizca.
找到馬凱亞金標大會的比賽場地，就在宏禮市對戰區北邊。
Win the Championship Tournament
取得競技大會勝利
Win the Makyan Championship being hosted in Prizca's Tournament Grounds. Prove that you are the best trainer in Makya!
贏得在宏禮市舉辦的馬凱亞競技大會，證明你就是現在馬凱亞最強的訓練師！
Stop Yezera!
阻止葉澤拉！
Confront Yezera for the final time in the Chamber of Regigigas, behind a large door in the eastern side of the Hollowed Layer (the cave east of the Team Chasm HQ).
在雷吉奇卡斯的密室與葉澤拉進行交鋒，就在裂隙隊總部東側的一扇大門後。
Explore Regigigas' Chamber
探索巨人的祕室
Continue to delve into the Chamber of Regigigas, so you can finally put a stop to Yezera's plan. The Chamber of Regigigas is behind a large door in the eastern side of the Hollowed Layer.
繼續深入雷吉奇卡斯的密室，並最終阻止葉澤拉的計劃。
The villain in the Teal-Eye-Mask blocks your path, this time in the first room of the Chamber of Regigigas. The Chamber can be found on the east side of the Hollowed Layer.
在雷吉奇卡斯密室的第一個房間，會有一個蒙面人來阻止你，解決他吧。
The villain in the Crimson-Eye-Mask blocks your path, this time in the first room of the Chamber of Regigigas. The Chamber can be found on the east side of the Hollowed Layer.
在雷吉奇卡斯密室的第一個房間，會有一個蒙面人來阻止你，解決他吧。
Defeat Sang
擊敗阿桑
Sang, the bad-tempered supporter of Yezera, blocks the exit to the first room of the Chamber of Regigigas. The Chamber can be found on the east side of the Hollowed Layer.
阿桑也算是葉澤拉的支持者，他堵住了通往雷吉奇卡斯密室第一個房間的出口。
Defeat Regigigas
擊敗雷吉奇卡斯
You found Yezera beyond the abandoned Team Chasm station in the Chamber of Regigigas, accompanied by an avatar of Regigigas. Defeat it!
你在雷吉奇卡斯的密室裡的裂隙隊研究站外找到了葉澤拉，她身邊還有一個雷吉奇卡斯的化身，打敗它！
Having defeated Regigigas, you can now venture into the full depths of the Chamber of Regigigas. Continue chasing Yezera!
擊敗雷吉奇卡斯後，你可以繼續往更深處走，去追趕葉澤拉了！
Game Won!
遊戲獲勝！
You've beaten the game! Explore around to find more of Makya, and return to old areas to find content you may have missed.
你已經結束了遊戲的主線流程，接 下來可以四處探索，尋找更多還沒發現的驚喜。

What are Style Points?
什麼是風格點數？
I'm the Style Points adjuster. How can I help?
我是風格點數調節器。我能幫到你什麼？
Style Points are numbers which have an effect on your Pokemon's stats.
風格點數是影響你精靈屬性的數字。
Pokemon start with 10 Style Points in each of their stats.
精靈的每個屬性都從10風格點數開始。
To add Style Points to a stat, you have to remove them from another.
要為一個屬性增加風格點數，你必須從另一個屬性中移除它們。
Investing into Attack and Sp. Atk is extra efficient: they go up at the same time!
投資於物攻和特攻特別有效：它們會同時增加！
Each stat's Style Points value can go as low as 0, and can go as high as 20.
每個屬性的風格點數可以低至0，高至20。
A Pokemon's Style Point total never changes, but Style Points give bigger stat bonuses at higher levels.
精靈的風格點數總數永遠不會改變，但在更高等級時，風格點數會給予更大的屬性加成。
If you need to move quickly, try using the Quick Set option!
如果你需要快速移動，試試使用快速設置選項！

Page {1}
第{1}頁
Ah, to be on solid ground again. Away from Galar's suffocating industrial sprawl. Stable. Connected. Tranquil. No cold steel shifting and rocking beneath my feet. No stench of smoke and oil to burn my lungs.
啊，又踏上了堅實的土地，遠離了伽勒爾那令人窒息的工廠，這種令人安心的穩定，緊密與寧靜，沒有冰冷的鋼鐵在我腳下晃動，也沒有灼人肺腑的惡臭油煙。
Just me, my companion, and Makya.
只有我，我的同伴，還有馬凱亞。
May 22nd
五月22日
I wonder if it's just me. So sentimental and wistful over little things I thought I knew. Is nostalgia tainting my perceptions? Or is the world truly as broken as it looks?
我不知道這是不是我的錯覺，我總對一些自以為熟悉的小事而惆悵，這種懷念與多愁善感...是這份懷念玷汙了我的認知，還是這個世界真的已經支離破碎？
My new friend makes me expect the latter. A sad story. But... inspiring nonetheless. Maybe I'll meet them again someday.
我的新朋友讓我更希望是後者，那是一個悲傷的故事，但...它也同樣鼓舞人心，或許還會有一天再見到他們。
May 26th
五月26日
Life. Not just Life as life – Life as creation. Life as energy. Life as imagination, and falsehood, and memory, and motion. Over six days in Makya, this is the one place that seems to be governed by Life... and not its negation.
生命，不僅僅是生命的生命-作為創造的生命，作為能量的生命，是虛妄，是記憶，是變化...在馬凱亞的這六天時間，這裡似乎是一個由生命支配的地方，而不是被生命所否定...
The world is dead. And Makya stands as little more than a polished mirror. What a shame.
世界已死，而馬凱亞，只不過是一面被擦亮的鏡子而已，真是遺憾。
May 29th
五月29日
I left last night when the earth began to rumble. I only returned for my companion, despite my... reservations.
我昨晚離開的時候，大地開始隆隆作響，儘管我...有所保留，還以為是我的...同伴回來了。
A great pit separates me from yesterday's memories. A dozen blackened eyes study my every step.
一個巨大的深坑將我與昨日的記憶隔開，十幾雙漆黑的眼睛注視著我的每一步。
What's done is done.
木已成舟...
June 4th
六月4日
At every turn, a set of eyes. On every perch, a silver scout. But... surely they cannot see everywhere? My friend at the Monument seemed to imply as much.
每一個轉彎，都有一雙眼睛，每一處棲息地，都有個銀色的斥候...但是，它們肯定不能看到每個角落吧？我在紀念碑的朋友似乎也在暗示我。
But with every step I take, I find a new reason to check over my shoulder. Whether it's guilt or fear that guides me to that great tower... well. I'd rather not dwell on that yet.
但我每走一步，都會找到新的理由來檢查我的肩膀，究竟是內疚，還是恐懼，指引我走向了那座高塔...算了，還是先不想這些了。
June 6th
六月6日
This was a mistake. This was <i>all</i> a mistake...
這是一個謬誤！這全部的一切<i>都</i>是謬誤...
A set of silver eyes rests atop Carnation Tower today. I couldn't shake the feeling that it expected me... He must know I stole His reign. Nothing makes sense if He doesn't.
今天，康乃馨塔頂上的銀色眼睛...我無法擺脫這種被祂等待的感覺...祂一定知道我竊取了它的全能，只有這樣...只有這樣一切才說得通。
To anyone reading this, I urge you: Speak to my friend at the Monument. As long as He stands without rule, we can act without fear.
讀到這裡的人啊，我敦促你們：去和我那在紀念碑的朋友談談吧，只要他屹立不倒，我們就能無所畏懼。
June 11th
六月11日
I can't afford to speak.
我無法說話。
I can't afford to trust.
我無法相信。
I can barely afford to write this.
我幾乎無法寫下文字。
A woman with hollow eyes and an uncanny smile approached me today. She asked about my history. She asked about Makya. She asked... about Him.
今天，有一個眼神空洞，笑容詭異的女人向我走來，她問起了我的過去，問起了馬凱亞，她還問...關於他的...
Tomorrow. All of this ends tomorrow morning.
明天...明天早上一切就會結束了。
June 13th
六月13日
This can't be a coincidence.
這絕不可能是巧合。
My best hope of escaping His grasp... but I can tell we're not moving anymore.
最終逃出他魔掌的希望...但是，我們已經走不動了。
Nobody seems to believe me. We can't even see the waves! And I've heard four hooves circling my bed for hours...
似乎沒人願意相信我，我看不到海浪，只能聽到...四隻蹄子在我的床上奔騰...
He won.
他贏了。
June 15th
六月15日
—Oriel
—奧利爾

<i>Judgement awaits. Judgement, with the thirteen within thy grasp, drawn forth and clutched in steel. The student, the twin wyrms, the guardians four, lush jungle, shining moon. Land, sea, sky, and shining o’er all: victory, yours evermore. Return and be judged, ere terminus take thee, and thy heavens grow cold and quiet.</i>
<i>審判，仍在等待，審判，由君執掌。十三個選中的人，被鋼鐵緊緊束縛，學生，巫師，四大守護者，茂密的叢林，閃耀的月亮，陸地，海洋，天空，一切無不閃耀：最終勝利...永遠只屬於你。回來吧，接受審判吧，在終點站將你帶走之前，你的天堂將變得冰冷而寧靜。</i>

It's open to a battling guide written by someone with the username "apolLyon."
它打開了一本由用戶名為"apolLyon"的人撰寫的戰鬥指南。
1.1 Roles/Cores
1.1 角色/核心
2.1 Leads
2.1 首發精靈
3.2 Hazards
3.2 場地不利因素
Which entry would you like to read?
你想閱讀哪一項？
Everything on your team needs a point. Every Pokémon needs a purpose.
你隊伍中的每一隻精靈都需要一個目標。每一隻精靈都需要一個存在的意義。
If you can't sum up its role on your team in a sentence, keep it in the PC.
如果你不能用一句話概括它在隊伍中的角色，就把它留在電腦裡。
Every bit of that Pokémon should reinforce its role. Moves, items, everything.
那隻精靈的每一個方面都應該強化它的角色。技能、物品，一切。
All six Pokémon on your team need a role, narrow or broad.
你隊伍中的六隻精靈都需要一個角色，無論這個角色是狹窄還是寬泛。
Two Pokémon with synergistic roles are called a "core."
兩隻具有協同作用的精靈被稱為一個“核心”。
If the two of them can take hits from a whole bunch of things, that's a defensive core.
如果它們能夠承受來自許多不同攻擊的傷害，這就是一個防禦核心。
If together they threaten lots of Pokémon and deal with each others' counters, that's an offensive core.
如果它們一起對許多精靈構成威脅並處理彼此的對策，這就是一個進攻核心。
Combine both and you have a balanced core. Good cores make for powerful teams.
將兩者結合，你就有了一個平衡的核心。強大的核心造就強大的隊伍。
You don't need them, but they're a surefire way to give your team some bite.
你不需要它們，但它們是讓你的隊伍更具攻擊力的可靠方法。
The Pokémon you start a fight with is your "lead."
你開始戰鬥時使用的精靈就是你的“首發精靈”。
Start every fight with it and it's a "dedicated lead." Make it a good one.
如果你每次都用它來開始戰鬥，那麼它就是一個“專用首發精靈”。讓它成為一個好的首發精靈。
Its job is to kick things off in your favor from round one.
它的任務是從第1回合開始就為你創造有利的局面。
Usually that's by vomiting up a whole bunch of hazards. Sometimes it sets screens and explodes.
通常這是通過吐出一大堆場地不利因素來實現的。有時候它會設置屏幕然後自爆。
A few just try to delete whatever's on the other side, usually with short-term power boosts like Gems.
有些則試圖直接消滅對方的精靈，通常會使用像寶石這樣的短期力量增加。
Speaking of which, your opponent is going to have their own lead.
說到這個，你的對手也會有自己的首發精靈。
Stop it. Taunt it, put it to sleep, or put it in the ground.
阻止它。挑釁它，讓它入睡，或者讓它陷入地面。
The arena is going to very rapidly fill up with nasty pointy things.
競技場很快就會佈滿討厭的尖銳物體。
That's because wasting a turn setting them up in the short term pays off big in the long term when they chew up a few Pokémon worth of health over the course of the match.
這是因為，從長遠來看，當這些場地不利因素在比賽中消耗掉幾隻精靈的健康時，前期花費1回合來設置它們是非常值得的。
If you like being alive, pack something that can clean up hazards – Defog, Terraform, or Rapid Spin, usually.
如果你喜歡保持健康，那就帶上一些能夠清除場地不利因素的東西——通常是除霧、攪土翻壤或高速旋轉。
Stealth Rocks are the most common hazard, so prioritize hazard removal if you've got lots of Rock-weak Pokémon.
隱形巖是最常見的場地不利因素，所以如果你有很多岩石屬性弱點的精靈，就優先清除場地不利因素。
Remember: if your favorite little gremlin is switching out nine times a match or is cripplingly weak to funny pebbles, put Heavy-Duty Boots on it.
記住：如果你最喜歡的那隻小妖精在一場比賽中切換了九次，或者對那些奇怪的小石頭異常脆弱，就給它穿上重型靴子。
They're cute and effective.
它們既可愛又有效。
You exit the PC.
你退出了電腦。
It's open to a battling guide written by someone with the username "snowwhip401."
它打開了一本由用戶名為"snowwhip401"的人撰寫的戰鬥指南。
Even keel
保持平衡
Best foot forward
全力以赴
Rolling with the punches
隨機應變
All the little pieces of your team need their own role.
你隊伍中的每一個小部分都需要有自己的角色。
Use whatever you want; just ensure that it's got something to do and the best odds of doing it.
使用任何你想要的；只要確保它有事情要做，並且有最好的機會去做。
Give bulky Pokémon Leftovers and healing moves.
給耐久型精靈攜帶剩飯和治療技能。
Give strong, slow Pokémon Focus Sashes, Vests, or ways to speed up.
給強大但速度慢的精靈攜帶焦點披帶、護符或加速的方法。
You get the idea.
你明白我的意思。
If you can, try to have all kinds of Pokémon on your team, so you have answers to anything.
如果可以的話，儘量讓你的隊伍中有各種各樣的精靈，這樣你就能應對任何情況。
Physical and special bulk and power, type matchups, speed profiles – a diverse team is a diverse toolbox.
物理和特殊耐久、力量、屬性剋制、速度配置——一個多樣化的隊伍就是一個多樣化的工具箱。
Send out the Pokémon that helps everything else on your team first.
先派出能幫助隊伍中其他精靈的精靈。
If you have a weather or a Room to set up, get to it.
如果你有天氣或場地要設置，那就去做吧。
If you don't have a clear, clean gameplan, ruin your opponent's.
如果你沒有一個清晰、乾淨的遊戲計劃，那就破壞對手的。
A dedicated lead's worst fear is usually a strong multi-hitting move. Neither Sturdy nor Sash can help them there.
一個專注的首發精靈最害怕的通常是強力的多段攻擊技能。堅固和披帶都無法幫助他們。
As opposed to simply trading hazards, outspeeding and KOing a lead before it gets going can give you an early advantage.
與簡單地交換場地不利因素相比，在首發精靈開始行動之前，通過速度優勢將其擊倒可以給你帶來早期優勢。
Each Pokémon's utility is defined by the opponent.
每隻精靈的實用性都是由對手定義的。
If your opponent has several Fire-type Pokémon, your Primarina is far more valuable.
如果對手有幾隻火屬性精靈，你的西施海壬就更有價值了。
Conserve its health and leverage its power.
保存它的體力併發揮它的力量。
In the same match, an Aegislash may be far less valuable – be willing to sacrifice it.
在同一場比賽中，阿羅拉盾甲龍可能就沒那麼有價值了——要願意犧牲它。
There's no shame in letting a Pokémon fall in order to get a safe switch to another.
為了安全地切換到另一隻精靈，讓一隻精靈倒下並沒有什麼可恥的。
While they may seem drastic, moves such as Healing Wish or Explosion can turn the tide of a match in a single turn.
雖然它們看起來很極端，但像治癒願望或自爆這樣的技能可以在1回合內扭轉比賽的局面。
Fainting the user can, if used with finesse, be an advantage – think of them as the ultimate U-Turn.
如果使用得當，讓使用者失去意識可以是一個優勢——把它們當作終極的極速折返。
The Corviknight stares at you intently.
鋼鎧鴉正在盯著你。
You get the sense that you've failed some sort of test.
你感覺自己沒能通過某種測試。

Tapu Lele's ability "Flutter Totem" creates a "Cruel Cocoon" upon entry that only affects its side and lasts for 6 turns.
卡璞·蝶蝶的特性“翩翩圖騰”，會在進入戰鬥時製造一個持續6回合，且隻影響己方的“殘酷之繭”。
At the end of each turn, it heals Pokémon on its side by 1/8th of their max HP.
在每個回合結束時，它會恢復其同側精靈最大HP的1/8。
However, they also lose 1 PP from each of their moves. Cruel indeed.
但這也會讓所有技能的PP減小，這就是其殘酷的地方。
Tapu Koko's ability "Storm Totem" creates a "Turbulent Sky" upon entry that only affects its side and lasts for 6 turns.
卡璞·鳴鳴的特性“暴風圖騰”，會在進入戰鬥時製造一個持續6回合，且隻影響己方的“動盪之空”。
Pokémon on its side get a 30% move damage boost, but they are prevented from using moves that are the same type as the move they most recently used.
其同側的精靈獲得30%的技能傷害增加，但他們無法使用與最近使用的技能相同屬性的技能。
Or, to state it another way, they can't use the same move type twice in a row.
只要上回合使用了某種屬性的技能，下回合同屬性就會被禁止。
Tapu Bulu's ability "Wild Totem" creates a "Primal Forest" upon entry that only affects its side and lasts for 6 turns.
卡璞·哞哞的特性“荒野圖騰”，會在進入戰鬥時製造一個持續6回合，且隻影響己方的“原始之森”。
Whenever a Pokémon on its side is hit by an offensive attack, it becomes enraged.
每當其同側的精靈被攻擊命中時，它會陷入狂暴狀態。
Thereby, its defense stats are both lowered by 1 step and its attack stats are both raised by 1 step.
這會使其減小自身的防禦和特防， 但增加自身的攻擊和特攻。
Tapu Fini's ability "Fog Totem" creates a "Misdirecting Fog" upon entry that only affects its side and lasts for 6 turns.
卡璞·鰭鰭的特性“迷霧圖騰”，會在進入戰鬥時製造一個持續6回合，且隻影響己方的“迷惑之霧”。
Whenever a foe finishes attacking a Pokémon on its side, the attacker is forced to switch out of battle.
每當敵方攻擊其同側的精靈後，攻擊者會被迫替換出戰鬥。
Unlike moves such as Roar or Whirlwind, however, the trainer has enough time to select the replacement themselves.
不過跟吼叫之類的技能不同，對方可以自行選擇要上場的精靈。

對方訓練師會嚴重高估技能造成的傷害。
7
Your team members' moves have a +30% chance to activate their moves' additional effects.
技能觸發附加效果的概率增加30%。
8
Your team takes 10% less move damage.
全員減小10%受到的技能傷害。
9
You gain 10% more money from battles. If you have more than $100,000, your team gets a boost to Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, and Sp. Def (before modifiers). This bonus scales with the level cap and is currently {b1}.
戰鬥得金錢加10%。擁有的金錢超100,000，雙攻和雙防會增加。與等級上限相關，目前{b1}。
10
Your team members gain 10% more EXP in battles. They also get a small boost to Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, and Sp. Def (before modifiers). This bonus scales with the level cap and is currently {b}.
戰鬥獲得額外10%經驗，小幅度增加雙攻和雙防。與等級上限相關，目前為{b}。
11
Whenever a member of your team uses a status move, they'll deal 25% more move damage next turn.
精靈使用變化類技能後，下回合技能造成的傷害增加25%。
12
Your team members take 15% less move damage if they're using a status move this turn.
精靈使用變化類技能的回合，減小15%受到的技能傷害。
13
Your team has 30% increased Sp. Def. Foes can't lower your team's Sp. Def.
全員獲得30%額外特防，且特防不會減小。
14
Your team members berries heal them for 25% more (multiplicative) and their gem-boosted attacks deal 25% more damage (multiplicative).
攜帶樹果的效果增加25%，寶石造成的傷害增加25%。
15
Your able party members and battlers heal for 1/10th HP whenever a foe faints.
對方失去戰鬥力時，恢復10%HP。
16
Your team has 30% increased Defense. Foes can't lower your team's Defense.
全員的物防增加30%，且物防不會減小。
17
Enemy Pokemon's chance to activate their additional effects against your team members is halved.
對方技能造成額外效果的概率減半。
18
Your team has 15% increased Speed.
使用攻擊技能的回合，減小15%受到的傷害。
19
Your Pokemon deal 15% more damage to targets that haven’t moved yet this turn. Your priority attacks and priority status moves have doubled PP.
對於還沒有行動的對手的傷害增加15%。先制技能需要多消耗1點PP。
20
Ignore the first time each battle that one of your team members would flinch or get a status condition.
每場戰鬥免疫1次異常狀態或畏縮。
21
Your team members take 15% less move damage if they're using an attack this turn.
全員“效果拔群”的技能增加15%傷害。
22
This tribe exists to test the PBS extensions system
此部族用於測試PBS擴展系統。

Be officially crowned Champion of Makya.
成為馬凱亞的冠軍。
Reach the credits with 10 or fewer hours on your save file.
遊戲時間10小時以內通關遊戲。
Defeat Zain in Prizca West with a shiny Skitty in your party.
在隊伍中有閃光向尾喵的情況下，於西宏禮市擊敗贊恩。
Decline Mavis' phone call at the end of the game.
遊戲結束時拒接梅維斯的電話。
Perfectly defeat Yezera in the Catacombs with the Tarot Amulet activated.
激活護身符的前提下，在地下墓穴中擊敗葉澤拉。
Defeat a gym leader while at a level cap below that of the leader's team.
在等級上限低於對方時，擊敗道館館主 。
Perfect Lambert, the first gym leader, at level cap 15 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高15級的情況下，激活塔羅牌護符並完勝蘭伯特。
Perfect Eko, the second gym leader, at level cap 20 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高20級的情況下，激活塔羅牌護符並完勝艾克。
Perfect Helena, the third gym leader, at level cap 25 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高25級的情況下，激活塔羅牌護符並完勝海倫娜。
Perfect Rafael, the fourth gym leader, at level cap 30 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高30級的情況下，激活塔羅牌護符並完勝拉爾夫。
Perfect Bence and Zoé, the fifth gym leaders, at level cap 40 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高40級的情況下，激活塔羅牌護符並完勝本斯和佐伊。
Perfect Noel, the sixth gym leader, at level cap 45 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高45級的情況下，激活塔羅牌護符並完勝諾埃爾。
Perfect Victoire, the seventh gym leader, at level cap 55 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高55級的情況下，激活塔羅牌護符並完勝薇克特爾。
Perfect Samorn, the eighth gym leader, at level cap 60 or below with the Tarot Amulet activated.
最高60級的情況下，激活塔羅牌護符並完勝賽蒙。
Destroy any legendary avatar.
擊敗任意傳說級化身。
Use a Primeval Move.
使用一次原初技能。
Defeat all 8 Team Chasm-created avatars within the locked chambers.
擊敗八個上鎖的密室中的化身。
Destroy the avatars of Spectrier, Glastrier, and Calyrex in the Crown Chamber.
擊敗皇冠之廳的蕾冠王、雪暴馬及靈幽馬化身。
Destroy the avatar of Rayquaza in the Tempest Realm.
擊敗暴風領域的烈空坐化身。
Capture a legendary Pokémon in a regular Poké Ball (thrown normally or created by the Ball Launcher.)
使用普通的精靈球捕捉傳說中的精靈。
Capture at least one Pokémon in a Premier Ball, a Cherish Ball, and a Royal Ball.
分別用紀念球、貴重球和皇家球各捕捉一個精靈。
Capture at least one Pokémon in a Potion Ball, a Slice Ball, a Leech Ball, and a Disable Ball.
分別用毒液球、分割球、寄生球和禁制球各捕捉一個精靈。
Visit a PokÉstate plot that has 30 Pokémon in it.
參觀一處有30只精靈的莊園。
Fully upgrade your Aid Kit.
全面升級急救包。
Reach Frostflow Farms Center without aquiring the Surf Board.
在沒有衝浪板的前提下抵達風霜農場。
Reach Prizca West without defeating the Avatar of Terrakion.
在不擊敗代拉基翁化身的前提下抵達西宏禮市。
Connect all Avatar Totems.
點亮所有化身圖騰。
Defeat all 7 former Makyan champions.
擊敗7位馬凱亞前冠軍。
After being crowned champion, defeat Pokémon Master Vanya with a full team of genderless Pokémon.
成為冠軍後，使用一支全員無性別的隊伍打敗凡雅。
Complete a full attempt of the Battle Monument (5 battles won).
完成一次完整的對戰紀念碑。
Complete a full attempt of the Battle Monument (5 battles won) with a Team whose members were all introduced in the same generation (Pokémon introduced in Tectonic count as a generation.)
以同一世代引入的精靈完成一次完整的對戰紀念碑，原創精靈視為新世代。
Complete a full attempt of the Battle Monument (5 battles won) with a Team whose members share no tribes in common.
在不激活部族的前提下完成一次完整的對戰紀念碑。
Start a battle while having an active Tribal bonus.
在獲得部族加成的前提下進入戰鬥。
At the end of a turn, have four or more hazards active on the opponent's side.
回合結束時，對手一側有至少四個陷阱或其它威脅。
At the end of a turn, have a Weather, a Room, and a Screen (on your side) active at the same time.
回合結束時，同時激活天氣、空間和己方的屏障。
Deal 1,000 or more damage in one hit.
打出一擊1000點以上的傷害。
Deal 10,000 or more damage in one hit.
打出一擊10000點以上的傷害。
Hold 500,000 or more money at once.
身上攜帶超過500,000金錢。
Have more than 1,000,000 experience stored in the EXP-EZ Dispenser at once.
在經驗分配器中儲存超過1,000,000點經驗值。
Achieve the top prize at Aquatopia Menagerie's Ocean Fishing Contest.
在水世界的海釣比賽中拔得頭籌。
